data.message: I know Em loves a challenge, now how about this? You used to be the greatest rapper Em, but there's a new kid in town and his name is Lin-Manuel Miranda.. I challenge you to make a concept album with a bigger and better story than Hamilton! I honestly do not think you can do it, you're too old, you don't have what it takes.. Or do you?

replies.message: Eminems never probably even heard of him so thats never gunna happen😂
LOL a broadway playwright having better verses than Eminem?! Please.

Em's never heard of Lin-Manuel Miranda? Of course he has :s What are you talking about Hollie?

And I do not know what you're talking about Zeeshan. But Dimitri, why are you talking about verses? I'm talking about music, songs and albums.. Everybody can make a dope verse, but only a few artists can make big and amazing concept albums. Lin-Manuel changed the game with Hamilton. He took rap and forced it to evolve. Rap has been dying since the late 90s. Without Lin-Manuel rap would have completely died off in a decade.
Robert Walle whatever your smoking I suggest you lay off it as complete utter shit is coming out your mouth 😂

Yes Ian, that's a very good point. What was I thinking? You're right. The way you challenged my point and proved me wrong was great man. Wow, like how did you get all that great knowledge about the evolution of hip hop?

Yes, I'm being very ironic if your small brain didn't get that. Listen, I'm actually making some valid arguments here for why Lin-Manuel is helping rap evolve, and all the OG rappers on his mixtape also see it. But you're right dude, I guess you know better than Joell Ortiz, Busta Rhymes and all those other rap veterans, right? smh
Robert Walle Miranda is the weakest lyricist in rap history.
Yo walle, Miranda is the weakest lyricist I ever heard

Hahaha! Say what Vincent? This is what I mean guys. I'm actually making some valid points and refering to actual albums you can check out, and the respons I get is that "Miranda is the weakest lyricist in rap history"? 😂 I can spot a troll from miles away man, and you're funny af man. And Travis trying to get me mad by calling me gay using emojis? Wtf? 😂 Yeah, you got me dude. I'm gay for Miranda, that's it. He's the weakest rapper alive selling better than Eminem two years straight. You guys make me laugh! 😂
Its sad how you think eminem will see this comment bro, and if you like miranda so much, comment on his shit and challenge him againgst em.
Why should I challenge Miranda to beat Em Ματθαιος Ι.? He already did with Hamilton. Have you been living under a rock bro?

You know em broke the record for most sold albums in a week or mabye it was month and that was recently broken by adele and she holds that shit now but eminem is more of an aquired taste and you kinda have to relate to him in one way or another adele sings with the voice of a fuckin angel about love and hardship and thats why she broke it. Anybody who isnt a 30 year old virgin can feel her especially women. But thats not really the point let me know when your bitch ass rapoer gets 15 fuckin grammys then we can talk
Eminem is the king with the crown on the throne for 18 years

How can a game that's  blacker then a black hole be ruled by white supremacy. Eminem will kick every N**** from here to yo mommys ass and then he'll come out her ass and reach your mouth on the other side of the street

Eminem is a top 10 rapper, but he is not the greatest, and you blind fanboys don't know shit about hip hop. Adele? What the fuck you're talking about dude? 15 grammys? Kanye won grammys and Kanye suck major dick, so a grammy doesn't prove shit! I challenge you fake ass bitches to come up with ONE god damn reason why Lin-Manuel suck and Em is king, ONE reason other than a grammy since that shit is bullshit and you know it.

Robert always know em is the rap God n still sitting on top of the rap chain  u may state or say whatever the fuck you want but he still gonna be n forever will be the best n besides can't u see u the only one ill speaking abt em here ,please man go to Miranda's page n tell it to those who care
That was a weak ass argument dude. Learn english, find a reason why you think Em is truly the best and come back to me, alright?
